description: This file defines the main route component for a Qwik-based note-taking web application. It manages state for notes, handles CRUD operations via NotesService, and renders various UI components such as sidebar, list, editor, and buttons. It uses Qwik hooks like component$, useStore, useSignal, and useTask$.

classes.name: NotesState
classes.description: Interface defining the reactive state object for notes, including loading status, error message, list of notes, selected note ID, view mode, filter string, and tags.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Interface representing an individual note with id, title, content, tags, and updated timestamp.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main component function returning JSX for the notes app layout, managing state and user interactions.

methods.name: head
methods.description: Exports page metadata for the route.
